1. Introduction

Basic Information

Community Hospitals of Central California (CHCC)

When Googling CHCC, the website that comes up first is “Community Medical Centers”. They list 4 hospital facilities on their site, but no location for a headquarters. These locations are:

  • Clovis Community Medical Center
    • 2755 Herndon Avenue
    • Clovis, CA 93611
    • (559) 324-4000
  • Community Regional Medical Center
    • 2823 Fresno Street
    • Fresno, CA 93721
    • (559) 459-6000
  • Fresno Heart & Surgical Hospital
    • 15 E. Audubon Drive
    • Fresno, CA 93720
    • (559) 433-8000
  • Community Behavioral Health Center
    • 7171 N. Cedar Avenue
    • Fresno, CA 93720
    • (559) 449-8000
